review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Are you supporting yourself by visioning how you see yourself in the future. See you
            on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            What’s the price you are willing to pay to achieve success and happiness? Any step forward has its risks.
            What risk are you willing to take? (Pillars # 1 & 9)
step_of_the_day.content:
"Dream big and dare to fail." Norman VaughanWhen the brains of risk takers are examined, it shows that their brains are wired differently. They can be
            ready to walk a tightrope across the Grand Canyon, and the fear centers do not light up, as they would do
            for anyone else. For most of us, risks and dangers are at the least, uncomfortable.It is helpful to make the decision that you are willing to pay a price for good things in your life and to
            feel good. I’m not talking about risking life and limb, I’m talking about the risk of being judged, the risk
            of making a mistake and not being perfect, or the risk of feeling uncomfortable. These are what I refer to
            as necessary risks to being on The Path. Where the rewards are greater than these risks.

action_step:
Determine what risk you are willing to take to move closer to one of your goals – today. And then take that
            risk.
journal_entry:
Write about those things – judgments and feelings - that get in your way, and what you are willing to
            experience in order to go beyond these obstacles.
